response.overview: Adelaide is insecure with her body just like any other woman in her twenties, but besides lip hair and stretch marks, Adelaide has to deal with her monstrous silver tongue that forms in her mouth whenever she gets excited. Everyone in Adelaide's life think they have the answer to her problems, including a deranged hunter who believes the only way to destroy the terror of the silver tongue is to destroy Adelaide altogether.
response.title: Red Whistle, Silver Tongue
